summary: Just a quick edit to make one of my favourite blades a bit more menacing.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] Just a quick edit to make one of my favourite blades a bit more menacing.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] Since this is only a texture replacing mod you can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Lossless Versions :[/b][/color] These 24/32bit versions give a nicer depth to the textures and should be free from any artifacts, but are much more memory intensive so if you are already low on V-RAM then avoid :). If anyone feels like editing my textures to their tastes then these are also a lot nicer starting point.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I always use the lossless versions of my textures alongside an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url]. For blades that look like they might actually cut something I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16072/?]Skyrim Weapon De-LARP-ification Project[/url].



[center][color=Lightsteelblue][b](: More Spooky Edits :)
[/b][/color]

author: Spookymunky
